title: Looking for ADC and Support for the 𝐿𝒶𝒸𝓉𝒶𝓉𝒾𝑜𝓃 𝒮𝓉𝒶𝓉𝒾𝑜𝓃 clash team 😳🤚
body:
I'm looking for a dedicated ADC and support 😤
A support who is ride or die 😍
And and ADC willing to WIN! 😡

TRUE ALPHAS SILVER AND GOLD ONLY 👊😏💪

Add: Speak or Die

Join 【L】【a】【c】【t】【a】【t】【i】【o】【n】       【S】【t】【a】【t】【i】【o】【n】... we HATE 𝕗𝕠𝕣𝕥𝕟𝕚𝕥𝕖 because real man play Ⓛⓔⓐⓖⓤⓔ ⓞⓕ ⓛⓔⓖⓔⓝⓓⓢ and not ᏉᎥᏒᎶᎧᏁᏕ

replies.body: DUO SUP/ADC AT YOUR DISPOSAL. SILVER/GOLD ELO HMU
Hey still need a support main currently g4 but don't be discouraged i play like g3 play :p

Hey there um my ign is xxseanksxx used to be support main. currently S4 now highest peak was S1.  ik the basic support currently playing jgl rn but i still know me support well. pls let me be in team :)  

ill play few games to brush up on me support skills. ty
